## ✅ PR Checklist

- [ ] Tested locally or on the dev environment
- [ ] Code is clean, readable, and documented
- [ ] Tests added or updated (if needed)
- [ ] Screenshots attached for UI changes (if any)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if relevant)
